query:
INSERT INTO prompts (title, description, promptText, category, useCase, tierRequired, source, model, complexity) VALUES

-- Composition Rescue (4 prompts)
('Composition Rescue: Perspective Correction',
'Fix perspective distortion in architectural and interior photos',
'Correct the perspective distortion in this image. Straighten vertical lines, fix converging parallels, and ensure architectural elements appear properly aligned. Maintain natural proportions while eliminating wide-angle lens distortion.',
'Image Generation',
'Fix perspective issues in architectural photography, real estate photos, and interior design images',
'lite',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'intermediate'),

('Composition Rescue: Rule of Thirds Reframe',
'Recompose images using the rule of thirds for better visual balance',
'Reframe this image using the rule of thirds composition principle. Position the main subject at intersection points, create visual balance, and improve the overall composition while maintaining the original scene integrity.',
'Image Generation',
'Improve composition of product photos, portraits, and landscape images',
'lite',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'beginner'),

('Composition Rescue: Leading Lines Enhancement',
'Add or enhance leading lines to guide viewer attention',
'Enhance the leading lines in this image to better guide the viewer''s eye toward the main subject. Strengthen existing lines or subtly introduce new ones while maintaining photorealistic quality and natural appearance.',
'Image Generation',
'Improve visual flow in marketing images, architectural photos, and landscape photography',
'lite',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'intermediate'),

('Composition Rescue: Negative Space Optimization',
'Optimize negative space for cleaner, more impactful compositions',
'Optimize the negative space in this image to create a cleaner, more impactful composition. Remove distracting elements, simplify the background, and ensure the main subject has appropriate breathing room while maintaining visual balance.',
'Image Generation',
'Clean up product photos, create minimalist designs, improve portrait backgrounds',
'lite',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'intermediate'),

-- Texture & Material Rendering (4 prompts)
('Texture Rendering: Fabric Realism',
'Generate photorealistic fabric textures with accurate draping and lighting',
'Create photorealistic fabric texture with natural draping, appropriate sheen, visible weave patterns, and realistic lighting interaction. Include subtle imperfections like wrinkles and fiber details for authenticity.',
'Image Generation',
'Fashion photography, product mockups, textile design, e-commerce images',
'pro',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'advanced'),

('Texture Rendering: Metal Surfaces',
'Generate realistic metal textures with proper reflections and oxidation',
'Generate a photorealistic metal surface with accurate reflections, appropriate oxidation or patina, visible grain or brushed texture, and realistic environmental reflections. Include subtle imperfections and wear patterns.',
'Image Generation',
'Product photography, industrial design, jewelry images, automotive renders',
'pro',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'advanced'),

('Texture Rendering: Wood Grain Detail',
'Create authentic wood textures with natural grain patterns',
'Create photorealistic wood texture with natural grain patterns, appropriate color variation, visible knots and imperfections, and realistic lighting that highlights the grain direction and depth.',
'Image Generation',
'Furniture photography, interior design, architectural visualization, product mockups',
'pro',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'advanced'),

('Texture Rendering: Glass & Transparency',
'Generate realistic glass with proper refraction and reflections',
'Generate photorealistic glass material with accurate refraction, appropriate reflections, subtle imperfections like fingerprints or dust, and realistic caustics. Ensure proper transparency and light interaction.',
'Image Generation',
'Product photography, architectural visualization, beverage images, packaging design',
'pro',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'advanced'),

-- Photo Editing & Enhancement (5 prompts)
('Photo Enhancement: Color Grading Cinema',
'Apply cinematic color grading for professional film look',
'Apply cinematic color grading to this image with teal and orange tones, crushed blacks, lifted shadows, and film-like contrast. Create a professional Hollywood blockbuster aesthetic while maintaining natural skin tones.',
'Image Generation',
'Marketing videos, brand photography, social media content, promotional materials',
'lite',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'intermediate'),

('Photo Enhancement: Golden Hour Lighting',
'Transform images with warm golden hour lighting',
'Transform this image to golden hour lighting with warm, soft sunlight, long shadows, rich golden tones, and that magical quality of light just after sunrise or before sunset. Maintain photorealistic quality.',
'Image Generation',
'Portrait photography, real estate images, travel photography, lifestyle content',
'lite',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'beginner'),

('Photo Enhancement: HDR Natural Look',
'Create natural-looking HDR enhancement without over-processing',
'Enhance this image with natural HDR processing that brings out shadow and highlight detail without the over-processed look. Maintain realistic colors, avoid halos, and preserve natural contrast while expanding dynamic range.',
'Image Generation',
'Real estate photography, landscape images, architectural photos, product photography',
'lite',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'intermediate'),

('Photo Enhancement: Bokeh Background',
'Add professional bokeh blur to backgrounds',
'Add professional bokeh background blur to this image with smooth, creamy out-of-focus areas, circular or hexagonal bokeh shapes from light sources, and natural depth-of-field falloff. Keep the main subject sharp and well-defined.',
'Image Generation',
'Portrait photography, product photography, food photography, lifestyle images',
'lite',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'beginner'),

('Photo Enhancement: Film Grain Aesthetic',
'Add authentic film grain for vintage analog look',
'Add authentic film grain to this image for a vintage analog photography aesthetic. Include subtle color shifts, appropriate grain size for the ISO equivalent, and that organic quality of film photography without looking overly filtered.',
'Image Generation',
'Brand photography, artistic images, social media content, editorial photography',
'lite',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'beginner'),

-- Social Media Optimized (4 prompts)
('Social Media: Instagram Grid Aesthetic',
'Create cohesive Instagram grid-style images',
'Create an image optimized for Instagram with cohesive aesthetic that matches a grid layout, appropriate negative space for text overlays, vibrant but not oversaturated colors, and composition that works at small sizes.',
'Image Generation',
'Instagram posts, social media marketing, brand content, influencer photography',
'starter',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'beginner'),

('Social Media: Pinterest Vertical Format',
'Generate Pinterest-optimized vertical images',
'Generate a vertical format image optimized for Pinterest (2:3 ratio) with eye-catching composition, clear focal point, appropriate text space at top or bottom, and visually striking elements that encourage saves and clicks.',
'Image Generation',
'Pinterest marketing, blog graphics, recipe images, DIY tutorials',
'starter',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'beginner'),

('Social Media: LinkedIn Professional',
'Create professional images for LinkedIn content',
'Create a professional, polished image suitable for LinkedIn with business-appropriate aesthetic, clean composition, professional color palette, and visual elements that convey expertise and credibility.',
'Image Generation',
'LinkedIn posts, professional branding, B2B marketing, thought leadership content',
'starter',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'beginner'),

('Social Media: TikTok Thumbnail Hook',
'Generate attention-grabbing TikTok thumbnails',
'Generate an attention-grabbing thumbnail image for TikTok with bold composition, high contrast, expressive elements, and visual hooks that stop scrolling. Optimize for mobile viewing and quick comprehension.',
'Image Generation',
'TikTok videos, short-form content, social media marketing, video thumbnails',
'starter',
'Nano Banana Pro',
'imagen-3',
'beginner');
